import "./EditorContainer.scss" import Editor from "@monaco-editor/react" const editorOptions = { fontSize:18, wordWrap:'on' } export const EditorContainer = () => { const onChangeCode = (newCode) => { console.log(newCode) } const onUploadCode = (event) => { const file = event.target.files[0]; const fileType = file.type.includes("text") if(fileType){ const fileReader = new FileReader(); fileReader.readAsText(file) } else{ alert("Please choose a program file!") } } return (
{"Title of the card"} edit
) }
